channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 09/04/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Updated call status logs to include assigned agent name Increased service resource limits for CPU and memory Fixed user status incorrectly switching to offline after missed outbound calls Adjusted agent permissions for viewing the member list Improved outbound call timeout to prevent early disconnection 08/28/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Fixed issue where user online status incorrectly switched to offline Fixed CSV upload failure when importing contact files Fixed incorrect agent presence status showing as offline Fixed abnormal behavior when using the Dialpad Fixed duplicate call log entries in SeaMeet integration Fixed incorrect display of total message count in WhatsApp channel 08/21/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Improved workspace creation flow by making name and address optional Improved WhatsApp template search to support all categories Backend now supports contacts without phone numbers Improved onboarding flow and UI guidance Changed default UI theme from dark to light 08/18/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Improved new user onboarding with a phone number application entry Fixed conversation sorting and updated microphone permission request behavior Fixed message forwarding issue from SeaX to SeaChat when no bot messages are present Fixed attachment display issue in forwarded messages Added integration between SeaX and SeaMeet for call analytics 08/07/2025 # New Features & Improvements # Refined call log layout and added visibility into the responsible agent for each call Improved workspace list behavior to hide UI when no invitations are present Added user activity logging during voice calls Fixed the dropdown menu UI overlapping issue Fixed issue preventing proper hang-up of inbound calls 07/31/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Improved contact label page and added conversation label feature Enhanced call tracking logs with status tracking functionality Improved phone number validation to support Argentina WhatsApp mobile number format Completed migration of Workspace API Key and event notification pages Fixed TwiML parsing error for outbound calls that caused call failures 7/24/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added auto-answer feature for incoming calls to help agents handle calls more efficiently Added status change logging for live agents Added backend support for setting agent skills and assigning corresponding IVR menus Improved CSV contact import to support Ctrl+M as a line terminator Fixed issue with blank page display in some cases 7/17/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for sending WhatsApp HSM campaigns with titles and multimedia files (images, documents, videos) Added mobile call settings for making and receiving calls Added a Skills page to create and assign skill groups Added user status overview in the member settings page Improved mobile interface for workspace browsing Fixed issue during WhatsApp binding 7/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added support for attaching images, documents, videos, and titles in WhatsApp campaigns.
